title: Corvus Hall
description: Welcome to THE IRISH PHANTOM SERIES! Written in closely linked novellas, the series is best enjoyed read in sequential order.After surviving an inexplicable supernatural event, a young woman from New Jersey is crippled by anxiety and phobias.But it isn't until years later when Mary's best friend is to be married at a lavish mansion in Ireland, that the mystery begins to unravel.Will she unlock the secrets of Corvus Hall before it's too late?Hold onto your seatbelts! The phantoms are coming! Corvus Hall was written in homage to the style of Daphne DuMaurier's Rebecca with a modern and surprising twist.
author: Bibiana Krall
